About

Page Art, Inc. provides professional art appraisal services specializing in Insurance appraisals, Estate appraisals, Donation appraisals, Litigation appraisals. With Established business experience, we offer expert valuations for insurance, estate planning, charitable donations, and more.

Specialties

Insurance appraisals Estate appraisals Donation appraisals Litigation appraisals

Services

In-office appraisals Remote appraisals

Pricing

Hourly rate: $350; Minimum for in-office consults: $500
